description:
Snake Slider for the Palm Pre is a highly addictive new puzzle game. The goal is to slide the green snake to the exit. This sounds easy but only the most clever players can solve the 100 increasingly difficult puzzles.

The first puzzle set introduces the green and yellow snakes. Move the snakes around so that the green snake can exit the basket. The second puzzle set adds apples and mushrooms. Snakes can eat apples but that will make them longer, leaving less room to move. On the other hand, some puzzles contain mushrooms that will shrink a snake, giving you more space. The third puzzle set adds movable blocks. You can't move the blocks directly but you can use the snakes to push the blocks around. The last carpet adds keys and locks, the snakes can eat keys to open the locks. Use all these elements wisely to solve the puzzles using as few moves as possible. 

Snake Slider features: 100 puzzles (more puzzles soon!), gradually increasing difficulty, beautiful hand-drawn graphics, intuitive controls, create your own puzzles with the editor, automatic save-game.

More puzzles will follow in the next update.
versionNote:
- Fewer goal steps for puzzles Red-22, 23
- Czech language support
